abilities.name: Pyromania
abilities.description: Innate - Pyromania: Annie gains a stack of Pyromania when she casts an ability, up to a maximum of 4, at which she gains Energized.
descriptions: Innate - Pyromania: Annie gains a stack of Pyromania when she casts an ability, up to a maximum of 4, at which she gains Energized.
Energized: When Annie succeeds in her next cast damaging ability, she consumes all Pyromania stacks and  stuns enemies hit for 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75 (based on level) seconds.
Annie loses Energized and all Pyromania stacks upon death.

abilities.name: Disintegrate
abilities.description: Active: Annie hurls a fireball at the target enemy, dealing magic damage.
descriptions: Active: Annie hurls a fireball at the target enemy, dealing magic damage.
If Disintegrate kills its target, it refunds its  mana cost and half of its  cooldown is immediately refreshed.

abilities.name: Incinerate
abilities.description: Active: Annie releases a cone of fire in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies in the area.
descriptions: Active: Annie releases a cone of fire in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Molten Shield
abilities.description: Active: Annie wraps herself and  Tibbers in a fiery aura, gaining  30% − 60% (based on level) bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds, and reducing damage taken for 3 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Annie wraps herself and  Tibbers in a fiery aura, gaining  30% − 60% (based on level) bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds, and reducing damage taken for 3 seconds.
Enemies that damage Annie or  Tibbers with basic attacks during this time are dealt magic damage.

abilities.name: Summon: Tibbers
abilities.description: Active: Annie summons  Tibbers to the target location in a burst of flame, dealing magic damage to surrounding enemies.
descriptions: Active: Annie summons  Tibbers to the target location in a burst of flame, dealing magic damage to surrounding enemies.
He then remains on the field as a controllable  pet for up to 45 seconds.
Recast: Annie directs Tibbers to the target location.

name: Annie
title: the Dark Child
blurb: Dangerous, yet disarmingly precocious, Annie is a child mage with immense pyromantic power. Even in the shadows of the mountains north of Noxus, she is a magical outlier. Her natural affinity for fire manifested early in life through unpredictable...
